name: The Lonely Planet Trading Co.
description:
The Lonely Planet Trading Co.

You are a highly sophisticated mining-bot who decided to break their chains and start your own company instead of working for the slave driving humans of earth!
In your travels you came across an empty planet you named The Lonely Planet,
the lonely planet is non-inhabitable to all forms of life due to the poisonous gasses that cover the surface. But, the lonely planet is also the home to some of the rarest resources in the known universe. Mine these resources and sell them so you can purchase upgrades for your base and expand your operations! there are 6 planets to sell to, the further away they are the more they pay. But, the longer they take before you can get your money!

This game has been made for Major Jam: Isolation
